name: Physicians Capital
overview: Physicians Capital, Inc. provides loans to physicians and corporate partners in ambulatory surgery centers (ASC) and boutique hospitals in the United States. The company focuses on offering loans based on future earnings from an ownership interest in an ASC or other stand-alone facility. Its services include loans for the ASC or physicians, commercial re-syndication or recapitalization loans, secure capital, access cash, and buy in financing. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Nashville, Tennessee.
